text: The 2015 Ping An Chinese Football Association Super League ()关于正确使用联赛全名称的函 was the 12th season since the establishment of the Chinese Super League, the 22nd season of a professional Association football league and the 54th top- tier league season in China. The league title sponsor was Ping An Insurance.中国平安4年6亿冠名中超 三大层面助力中国足球 Guangzhou Evergrande Taobao won their fifth consecutive title of the league. == Team changes == Teams promoted from 2014 China League One * Chongqing Lifan * Shijiazhuang Ever Bright Teams relegated to 2015 China League One * Dalian Aerbin * Harbin Yiteng === Name changes === * Shanghai Dongya F.C. changed their name to Shanghai SIPG F.C. in December 2014.上海东亚足球俱乐部更名为上海上港集团足球俱乐部的公示 * Guangzhou Evergrande F.C. changed their name to Guangzhou Evergrande Taobao F.C. in December 2014.关于广州恒大主要股权变更并更名为广州恒大淘宝的公示 * Jiangsu Sainty F.C. changed their name to Jiangsu Guoxin-Sainty F.C. in January 2015.关于江苏舜天足球俱乐部有限责任公司更名的公告 ==Clubs== ===Clubs and locations=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:95%" ! | Li Bing (caretaker) | 24 August 2015关于聘请德拉甘•斯托伊科维奇担任广州富力足球俱乐部主教练的公告 | Dragan Stojković | 24 August 2015 |} ===Foreign players=== The number of foreign players is restricted to five per CSL team, including a slot for a player from AFC countries. A team can use four foreign players on the field in each game, including at least one player from the AFC country. Players from Hong Kong, Macau and Chinese Taipei are deemed to be native players in CSL. However, those players will be treated as foreign Asia players if they participate in any AFC competitions. {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! Date |- | Paulo Henrique || Shanghai Greenland Shenhua || Shanghai Shenxin ||align="center"| 6–2恩里克戴帽卡希尔首秀 上海德比申花6-2 || |- | Ricardo Goulart || Guangzhou Evergrande Taobao || Shanghai Shenxin ||align="center"| 6–1高拉特戴帽于汉超两球 恒大6-1逆转申鑫 || |- | Dejan Damjanović || Beijing Guoan || Changchun Yatai ||align="center"| 3–1德扬帽子戏法 国安3-1力克亚泰迎3轮首胜 || |- | Demba Ba || Shanghai Greenland Shenhua || Jiangsu Guoxin-Sainty ||align="center"| 3–1登巴巴演帽子戏法陶源破门 申花3-1舜天 || |} ==League attendance== † † ==Awards== The awards of 2015 Chinese Super League were announced on 10 November 2015.2015中超颁奖:高神MVP野牛金靴 斯帅最佳教练 * Chinese Football Association Footballer of the Year: Ricardo Goulart (Guangzhou Evergrande Taobao) * Chinese Super League Golden Boot Winner: Aloísio (Shandong Luneng Taishan) * Chinese Super League Domestic Golden Boot Award: Wu Lei (Shanghai SIPG) * Chinese Football Association Goalkeeper of the Year: Zeng Cheng (Guangzhou Evergrande Taobao) * Chinese Football Association Young Player of the Year: Vacant * Chinese Football Association Manager of the Year: Luiz Felipe Scolari (Guangzhou Evergrande Taobao) * Chinese Football Association Referee of the Year: Tan Hai * Chinese Super League Fair Play Award: Shijiazhuang Ever Bright, Hangzhou Greentown, Chongqing Lifan * Chinese Super League Team of the Year (442): **GK Zeng Cheng (Guangzhou Evergrande Taobao) **DF Zhang Linpeng (Guangzhou Evergrande Taobao), Kim Young-Gwon (Guangzhou Evergrande Taobao), Feng Xiaoting (Guangzhou Evergrande Taobao), Xu Yunlong (Beijing Guoan) **MF Zheng Zhi (Guangzhou Evergrande Taobao), Huang Bowen (Guangzhou Evergrande Taobao), Wu Xi (Jiangsu Guoxin Sainty), Darío Conca (Shanghai SIPG) **FW Ricardo Goulart (Guangzhou Evergrande Taobao), Wu Lei (Shanghai SIPG) ==References== ==External links== *Current CSL table, and recent results/fixtures at Soccerway *Chinese Super League table at FIFA *Chinese Super League official site Category:Chinese Super League seasons 1 China China
title: 2015 Chinese Super League
